briefTitle: Sitagliptin Metformin/PPARg Agonist Combination Therapy Add-on (0431-052)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient has type 2 diabetes mellitus
* Patient is inadequately controlled while taking two oral antidiabetic medications

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patient has a history of type 1 diabetes mellitus or history of ketoacidosis
* Patient required insulin therapy within the prior 3 months
* Patient has been taking Byetta (R) (exenatide) within the prior 3 months

outcomeMeasures.description: HbA1c is measured as a percent. Thus, this change from baseline reflects the Week 18 HbA1c percent minus the Week 0 HbA1c percent.
